name: VR Ambisonic Prototype
description:
This is the final project from my coursework studying virtual reality and ambisonic audio in Unity at Northwestern's Sound Arts and Industries department. The game is playable without a headset and involves slowly wandering a small environment with spatialized, complimentary audio objects that weave a pleasant soundscape as you walk. It's a simple prototype but I hope if you play it, you find it relaxing!

The demo is currently only playable on PC.
